name: ASSOCIATED INDUSTRIES OF MASSACHUSETTS
description: AIM is an association interested in all matters that impact the cost of doing business
sampleDescriptions: AIM is concerned about all issues relative to manufacturing - ACA reform, Tax Reform and we occasionally will write letters to Massachusetts Delegation on these issues
